name: Lucky Cannon Auto Battle
description: "Lucky Cannon Auto Battle" is an exciting strategy game where you battle against other players in a thrilling battle of luck and skill. The game is played on a chessboard with four player turrets located in each corner. To fire your cannon, you must trigger it by launching marbles from the adjacent machine. The objective of the game is to eliminate your opponents by strategically firing your cannon and avoiding their attacks. The last player standing wins the game!
